name: Tower Defense - Prototype
description:
This game is a prototype and may get into full development in future
  • The towers will attack the closest enemy within their range
  • If all towers are placed and you click on a grid then the oldest placed tower is replaced to the new position
  • Destroy the enemies before they reach your base
How to play:
  • Click on any valid grid to place tower
  • Tower limit is 3
